title: Small plane crashes in Florida; all 3 on board killed
byline: All three people on board a small plane were killed when the aircraft crashed in Boca Raton, Florida, on Friday morning, according to local officials and the Federal Aviation Administration.

title: Trump signs executive order on water pressure to ‘restore shower freedom’
byline: A global trade-war rollercoaster was not enough to distract Donald Trump from fulfilling one of his longtime priorities on Wednesday: changing the federal definition of “shower head”, a move the White House said would “end the Obama-Biden war on water pressure”.

title: England’s record wicket-taker Jimmy Anderson awarded a knighthood
byline: Jimmy Anderson is to be awarded a knighthood for “services to cricket” a year on from the final Test of his record-breaking England career.

title: Small plane crashes in Florida; all 3 on board killed
byline: All three people on board a small plane were killed when the aircraft crashed in Boca Raton, Florida, on Friday morning, according to local officials and the Federal Aviation Administration.

title: Pilleyan detained for 90 days
byline: The Criminal Investigation Department (CID) has obtained a 90-day detention order for the further interrogation of former State Minister Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan, also known as ’Pilleyan’, police said.

title: CEB urges rooftop solar owners to switch off inverters
byline: In a move to maintain the stability of the national power grid during the festive season, the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has issued a special request to rooftop solar system owners across the country.

title: US has no capacity to impose its will on the rest of the world: Ranil
byline: The U.S. does not have the economic capacity to impose its will on the rest of the world, former President Ranil Wickremesinghe said today.

title: Navy seizes over 100kg of heroin and ICE
byline: The Sri Lanka Navy seized more than 100 kilograms of heroin and crystal methamphetamine (ICE) during a special maritime operation off the island’s western coast early this morning.

title: Trump exempts smartphones and computers from new tariffs
byline: US President Donald Trump’s administration has exempted smartphones and computers from reciprocal tariffs, including the 125% levies imposed on Chinese imports.

title: NCPA launches investigation into inhumane punishment of Grade 3 students
byline: The National Child Protection Authority (NCPA) has launched an investigation into the inhumane punishment of Grade 3 students at a boys’ school in the Colombo Education Zone, NCPA Law Enforcement Director, Ms. Sajeewani Abeykoon said.

title: WhatsApp down: Users unable to send messages
byline: Meta-owned social media giant WhatsApp was down for several users globally on Saturday (Apr 12), according to outage tracking website Downdetector.

title: CEB requests rooftop solar owners to temporarily switch off systems
byline: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) appeals to all rooftop solar system owners across the country to voluntarily switch off their systems during daytime hours—till 3:00 PM each day—from April 13 to April 21.
